nodes.bodyText: ✏️ You can remove the {} and the return since this a pretty short predicate statement now
❓ Why can't we just do const attributes = this.props.results.map(result => result.attributes)?

You're right, I think I could do something like
const attributes = Array.from(new Set(this.props.results.map(result => result.attributes))) which would be more concise. The Set part is just so that I can get only the unique values
If you only want unique values you can use the distinct() stream operator like this.props.results.map(result => result.attributes).distinct()
this is exactly what i was looking for - thanks
